episode41.name: 42   SEC Baseball Tourney and Regional Preview
episode41.description: Arkansas went 2-2 in the SEC tournament and earned a #2 seed in the Stillwater, Oklahoma regional. We talk about what happened at the SEC tourney as well as breakdown the teams in the regional.
episode41.keywords: Arkansas, Baseball, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Hogcast, WPS, Woo Pig Sooie, Basketball, football,
